person.persName: Henry H. Hadley (Fayette County, KY, captain 119th USCI Perry Co, OH resident)

body.p: Perry County, Ohio, soldier. Ohio native. Son of William Hadley and Jane Hadley. Married to Samantha M. Rose Hadley in Perry County, Ohio, on November 22, 1860. Father of Nettie B. Hadley. Student in Perry County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Perry County in 1860. Served in the United States Army Signal Corps as a private in Washington, D. C., until October 9, 1864. Served in the 119th U. S. Colored Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain and quartermaster from July 1864, to April 27, 1866. Served as the commandant of Camp of Reception for Colored Recruits for the District of Western Kentucky from January 11, 1865.
